app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate SpeakTranslator Traveler
app_description: Voice Translator is a great translator for voice translation text translation and photo translation. No matter where you are in the world you can communicate and travel efficiently and smoothly. It has great translation translation capabilities: Voice to speech translation Real time speech recognition automatically translates into text and voice corresponding to the voice and can translate the voice of the other party into your voice Text to text translation: it can translate the text you input into the corresponding text and automatically play the translated voice Photo translation: translate the street signs signs slogans or documents you see into the language you have. Supports voice to speech translation in up to 12 mainstream languages. Voice settings: Select male or female voice. Get the premium version to access all advanced features 1 Unlimited voice translation 2 Unlimited photo translation 3 Text translation to voice 4 No ads Automatic renewal terms Subscribe to provide 3 time period VIP services including: one month VIP service 1.99 three month VIP service 3.49 Permanent VIP service 14.49 This pricing is the same as the Apple App Store Matrix in the price area determined by other currencies. Subscriptions will be deducted from your iTunes account when you confirm your purchase and at the beginning of each renewal period. You can cancel your subscription or trial at any time by going to your iTunes account to set up and unsubscribe or you will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours prior to the end of the trial period or any subscription period to avoid being charged. Subscriptions with a trial period will automatically renew as a paid subscription. Subscriptions can be managed by the user and automatic renewal can be turned off after the purchase to the user s account settings. When you purchase an advanced subscription during the trial period any unused portion of the trial period if provided will be invalid.
